original_title: Lesbian Slumber Party #3: Girls Volleyball Team
overview: Gorgeous young lesbians are back for more slumber party antics in volume 3 of this hit Girl Candy Films series. As the girls' volleyball team nears the end of their season, the nubile young girls decide to celebrate with a slumber party by the ocean. But the intimate setting causes repressed desires and unspoken feelings to reach feverish levels of intensity. See the frustrated beauties struggle with their lesbian lust for each other's perfect bodies and confess their secrets as only young girls can.
title: Lesbian Slumber Party #3: Girls Volleyball Team
